author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HEAVY RAINS EXPECTED TO CONTINUE OVER EASTERN MEXICO TODAY...
summary: ...HEAVY RAINS EXPECTED TO CONTINUE OVER EASTERN MEXICO TODAY... As of 7:00 AM CDT Sun Jun 29 the center of Two was located near 20.0, -96.0 with movement WNW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1010 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HEAVY RAINS EXPECTED TO CONTINUE OVER EASTERN MEXICO TODAY... As of 7:00 AM CDT Sun Jun 29 the center of Two was located near 20.0, -96.0 with movement WNW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1010 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Depression Two (AT2/AL022025)
